about_the_game:
The most prominent figure in the land of Witchdom - the Block Wizard - has vanished without a trace. 

Take on the hats of seven witches - the Block Wizard’s very own, precious, granddaughters - to solve the mystery of his disappearance, and locate him before it’s too late.

Journey through mystical and enchanting locations of Witchdom, meet its Guardian Spirits, gain their trust, and request their aid in your search.

Play through fun and challenging maze-like levels by floating through the space, and not stopping until you reach a solid surface. Defeat or avoid enemies, and various arcane mechanisms, don’t forget to utilise each witch’s special abilities.

Enjoy vibrant and wacky dialogue in this narrative puzzle-adventure game, and delve deep into this story of family bonds, journey through hardship, and growth. 

Fun and Innovative Gameplay

  • Play through maze-like, slide-on-ice inspired puzzles that are sure to challenge your brain, and your hand-eye-coordination. 

  • Use each of the witches’ unique abilities to solve levels filled with enemies impeding your way, tricky mechanisms and helpfully unhelpful teleporters.

  • Collectables scattered around each level can help you reach the goal. And keep an eye out for those snazzy-looking boxes. They’ll come in handy.

  • Use all the skills you learned to defeat a multitude of terrifying and powerful Boss Enemies that stand in your way.

  • Tick-tock, tick-tock, time is ticking. And time translates into points. Combos, collectibles, enemies, and more, can affect your final score. What’s the fastest you can pass each level?

  • And if you’re looking for a real challenge: Try out the Gauntlet Levels - where the puzzles become the focus. 

Colourful Cast of Characters

  • Experience the story through the Block Wizard’s granddaughters, 7 colourful witches, each with their own arcane specialty and quirky personality.

  • These 7 cousins have a bond like no other - no matter what they try to tell you. Explore their interesting dynamics and interpersonal relationships. 

Journey Through Emotions

  • Watch the story unfold through animated visual novel-styled cutscenes.

  • Explore the characters and their complex relationships with each other, and find out what the Block Wizard’s disappearance really means for the 7 cousins.

Vibrant World Setting

  • The world of Witchdom, is vast and full of wonder and mystery. This vivid land is called home for many witches and wizards of every shape, size and ability. Everyone is welcome here. So long as you don’t forget to obey the Laws of the Forest and the Sky, the gilded doors will remain open for you. 

  • Discover what Witchdom has to offer and the secrets that lurk beneath its illustrious surface: Guardian Spirits, evil powers that be and many more.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t, 2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Steam Deck OLED targeting 60FPS with native settings.

short_description: The Block Wizard has vanished without a trace and his granddaughters, seven witches of their own might, will unravel this mystery. Block Witch is a narrative puzzle-adventure game filled with slide-on-ice inspired maze-like puzzles, unique characters, wacky dialogue, and a vibrant world.
